name: Li Xiao 0001
content: Li Xiao at Michigan State University Li Xiao Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering 3115 Engineering Building Michigan State University East Lansing, MI 48824 Phone: 517-353-4386 Fax: 517-432-1061 Research Interests Distributed and networking systems, wireless and mobile computing, overlay systems and applications, system resource management, and design and implementations of experimental algorithms.
